translation: Arjuna said, "Later was Thy birth, and prior to it was the birth of Vivasvan (the Sun); how am I to understand that Thou hast taught this Yoga from the beginning?"
commentary: 4.4 Another later? Your Thy? Birth birth? But prior? Birth birth? Vivasvan of Vivasvan? How how? This this? Vijaniyam am I to understand? You Thou? Aado in the beginning? said taughtest? It thus.Commentary Thy birth took place later in the hourse of Vasudeva Vivasvan or Vivasvat (the Sun) was born earlier in the beginning of evolution.
